ch0247_10_dande/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I enjoy battling and
exploring with you!
ch0247_10_dande/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s have a champion time together!
ch0247_10_dande/7101_0701_01_10:
Did you know that Eternatus came to the Galar
region 20,000 years ago, attached to a meteor?
ch0247_10_dande/7101_0701_02_10: It came all the way from outer space to meet us...
ch0247_10_dande/7101_0701_03_10: When you think about it, it sounds like a fantasy!
ch0247_10_dande/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m completely different from Eternatus... We grew
up in different places and in different ways.
ch0247_10_dande/7102_0701_02_10:
I think most people would worry about how to
get along with someone so different from them.
ch0247_10_dande/7102_0701_03_10:
But when we battle, I know that we’re connected,
deep in our hearts!
ch0247_10_dande/7102_0701_04_10:
I think Eternatus feels the same way, too! It’s doing
its best to get along with humans!
ch0247_10_dande/7103_0701_01_10:
Raihan has been challenging me to a lot of
battles recently.
ch0247_10_dande/7103_0701_02_10:
When we battle, it’s super intense! We can feel
the power of Eternatus and all our other Pokémon
up close!
ch0247_10_dande/7103_0701_03_10:
I’d like to have a battle like that with you, too! I’ll
be sure to challenge you soon!
ch0247_10_dande/7104_0701_02_10:
What do you think of this pattern on the sides?
Wicked, isn’t it?
ch0247_10_dande/7104_0701_03_10:
When you see an opening, you’ve got to attack!
That’s what it represents!
ch0247_10_dande/7105_0701_01_10:
I often have Eternatus and Charizard spar with
each other.
ch0247_10_dande/7105_0701_02_10:
They clash with all their might to make each
other stronger!
ch0247_10_dande/7105_0701_03_10:
You and I could have the same sort of rivalry, too!
That’s a surefire way for us to get stronger!
ch0247_10_dande/1701_0701_01_10: Hey! You ready for your present? Here you are!
ch0247_10_dande/1701_0702_01_10: Go ahead and use it right away!
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0701_01_10: I tend to get lost quite often.
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, Eternatus will walk in front of me and
try to lead the way...
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0701_03_10:
but I don’t think Eternatus is concerned about
where I’m headed. So in the end, we still
get lost...
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0702_01_10:
I may choose the wrong path by mistake, but I
don’t want to make any mistakes when choosing
my future. You feel the same way, don’t you?
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0702_02_10:
Although...I’ve never actually regretted any of the
paths I’ve chosen.
ch0247_10_dande/2501_0702_03_10:
Because everything I’ve chosen until now has
worked out in the end!
ch0247_10_dande/2511_0701_01_10:
It can be emotionally demanding to be responsible
for such an incredible power.
ch0247_10_dande/2511_0701_02_10:
In the end, I can only rely on my own strength to
wield that power!
ch0247_10_dande/2511_0702_01_10:
I still don’t know if I’m a Trainer worthy of
Eternatus’s respect yet.
ch0247_10_dande/2511_0702_02_10:
But what I can do now is gain more strength as
a Trainer and trust Eternatus!
ch0247_10_dande/3001_0701_01_10:
Once the sun rises, the future is upon us!
Let’s give it our all today!
ch0247_10_dande/3003_0701_01_10:
It’s lunchtime. We’d best replenish our energy with
a good meal! What do you want to eat? It’ll be
my treat!
ch0247_10_dande/3005_0701_01_10:
Whoa! Time certainly does fly! But we can have a
champion time no matter how late it gets!
